common_issues.title: Pieces OS: Performance Issues and Download Errors
common_issues.description: Users report slow performance with Long Term Memory, especially on Windows, impacting apps like Slack and Discord. High CPU usage is observed, even after trying cloud processing. Additionally, issues arise when downloading or canceling LLM downloads, with models getting stuck in initialization. Temporary solutions include reinstalling the app or deleting specific files.

related_issues.text:
Long Term Memory still slows down my PC, even after updating to LTM-2
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Turning on Long Term Memory has been slowing down my desktop computer, even before LTM-2. After updating today, it still happens. It's most noticeable when I use Slack and Discord, and disabling those apps on LTM doesn't work. Even after switching the Processing Mode to Cloud, as suggested by HRA42 on the Discord server, the lag still occurs. At some point, the total CPU usage went up by over 90%.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/eaef0d65-b19b-41f0-bf8a-f143fa8d1e43)

My computer specs:
- CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-6300 CPU @ 3.80GHz
- RAM: DDR4 32 GB
- Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 2 GB

I'm yet to notice significant slowness on other programs, but if I'm getting a lot of lag on those chat apps, I can imagine I would get them too on something heavier like Visual Studio.

**Additional notes:**

related_issues.title: Bug: unable to cancel the download of an LLLM
related_issues.text:
Bug: unable to cancel the download of an LLLM
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

latest

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6e730898-a168-4571-ab0d-6331c4d389a4)

i want stop but its not working 

## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points Raised:**

* User @msaqibbop reported an issue where the "Stop Downloading" button for the Mistral 8 7b model did not work and caused the model to get stuck in "Initialization" state.
* User @AkhilTrivediX confirmed experiencing the same issue and provided a temporary fix.

**Problems Identified:**

* The "Stop Downloading" button for the Mistral 8 7b model was malfunctioning.
* Clicking the button repeatedly could cause the model to get stuck in "Initialization" state.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* **Temporary fix:** Delete all files from `C:/Users/[YOUR-USERNAME]/Documents/com.pieces.os/` and reinstall Pieces OS and desktop app.
* **Permanent fix:** The Local Large Language Model stack is being replaced with new infrastructure, expected to be in production within 2-3 weeks.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The temporary fix provided by @AkhilTrivediX can be used to address the issue.
* The permanent fix is expected to be available in the next 2-3 weeks.

**Additional Notes:**

* The author of the issue, @mark-at-pieces, offered to chat in real-time for further assistance.
* The user @AkhilTrivediX also listed other attempts to fix the issue that did not work.

recommendations: **Investigate Pieces OS 11.2.1 Bugs:** Prioritize addressing the bugs related to "Secret Message" example, Pieces Copilot in local processing mode, and update failures as they are impacting multiple users.

**Address Performance Issues:** Look into reports of slow performance with Long Term Memory, especially on Windows, and high CPU usage. Consider optimizations or providing clearer guidance on hardware requirements.

**Review Update and Download Processes:** Address issues with Pieces OS updates and downloads, including failures, antivirus conflicts, and unresponsive download cancellation buttons. Improve communication around update processes and potential conflicts.

**Improve LLM Download Experience:** Investigate and resolve issues with LLM downloads, such as models getting stuck in initialization and difficulties canceling downloads. Explore ways to make the download process more robust and user-friendly.

**Proactive Communication:**  Keep users informed about ongoing issues, planned fixes, and estimated resolution times.  This could involve updating relevant support articles, forum posts, or in-app notifications.

**Gather More Detailed Reports:** Encourage users to provide more detailed bug reports, including system specifications, steps to reproduce the issue, and any error messages encountered. This will help in faster diagnosis and resolution of problems.

**Enhance Support Resources:** Expand the knowledge base with articles and FAQs addressing common issues and their solutions.  Provide clear and concise troubleshooting steps for users experiencing difficulties.

**Consider Automated Troubleshooting:** Explore the possibility of incorporating automated troubleshooting tools or diagnostics within the Pieces OS application to help users identify and resolve common problems independently.
